mapper.select: SELECT s.ID as id, s.TYPE as type, s.NAME name, s.MEMO as memo, s.STATE as state, s.COMPANY_ID as companyId, c.NAME as companyName, s.ADD_TIME as addTime, s.ADD_USER_ID as addUserId, s.MOD_TIME as modTime, s.MOD_USER_ID as modUserId, s.UPDATE_LOCK as updateLock FROM AUTHZ_T_PERMISSION s LEFT JOIN ORG_T_COMPANY c on s.COMPANY_ID = c.ID ORDER BY s.MOD_TIME DESC

SELECT s.ID as id, s.TYPE as type, s.NAME name, s.MEMO as memo, s.STATE as state, s.COMPANY_ID as companyId, c.NAME as companyName, s.ADD_TIME as addTime, s.ADD_USER_ID as addUserId, s.MOD_TIME as modTime, s.MOD_USER_ID as modUserId, s.UPDATE_LOCK as updateLock FROM AUTHZ_T_PERMISSION s LEFT JOIN ORG_T_COMPANY c on s.COMPANY_ID = c.ID WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHZ_T_PERMISSION ( TYPE, NAME, STATE, MEMO, COMPANY_ID, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, MOD_TIME, MOD_USER_ID, UPDATE_LOCK ) VALUES( #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE AUTHZ_T_PERMISSION SET TYPE = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state, jdbcType=TINYINT}, MEMO = #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, MOD_TIME = #{modTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_LOCK = #{updateLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and UPDATE_LOCK = #{holdLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
